summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to The City Light Department, authorizing the Superintendent of The City Light Department to negotiate with the Puget Sound Power and Light Company for the acquisition of an interest by the City in certain combustion turbine generating units, and to execute an option or options to purchase an interest in said units, increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1979 Budget of The City Light Department; and making an appropriation from the Light Fund therefor.
